Title: The (E)Lephant, The share sites download manager! [RapidShare MegaUpload ++]
Description:
The (E)Lephant is a project i have started about two years ago that holds the sole purpose of helping users to help users with rapidshare automatic downloading support, or any other share host for that matter!

It automatically downloads from rapidshare with much more to it!
HomeWiki:
Project Description
The (E)Lephant is a project i have started about two years ago that holds the sole purpose of helping users to help users with rapidshare automatic downloading support, or any other share host for that matter!

It automatically downloads from rapidshare with much more to it!

The (E)Lephant is by far the only share sites (RapidShare, MegaUpload, NetLoad and others) download manager that has a built in search for contents to download!!!

Our home page: www.e-lephant.org
Our project download page: www.e-lephant.org/E-Download.php
